name: B!rds
description:
In this chaotic game, you control some birds on a wire. You manage their position, but their stomach is not yours to control. Make sure you time the birds' poop right with the people below it. Some people give a lot of points, but some people might actually sabotage you. And of course, there are drones to wiretap people on their phones!

For the BirdJam 2022, I decided to not dive into the gameplay, but learn to more polish this game. Therefore, the gameplay might feel a bit off; but at least I learned a ton about polishing a game. I hope you like it!
